desc: Re-Mov™ Adhesive and Silicone Remover instantly unbonds adhesives with an environmentally friendly, state-of-the-art formula.

layout.text: Re-Mov™ ASR easily, quickly and safely removes silicone and polyurethane caulks from a multitude of surfaces without damaging coatings or surrounding materials. Re-Mov is the best Silicone/Adhesive remover on planet Earth.
